import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { Formik, Field } from "formik"; import { AuthContext } from "../../context/auth"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import Axios from "../../api/axios"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Container, Row, Col, Label, } from "reactstrap"; import MainNavbar from "components/Navbars/MainNavbar.js"; import UserFooter from "components/Footers/UserFooter.js"; const Signup = ({ title, jobs }) => { const [generalError, setGeneralError] = useState(""); const [formError, setFormError] = useState({}); const history = useHistory(); const auth = useContext(AuthContext); const url = jobs === "Teacher" ? "http://localhost:3001/join/teacher" : "http://localhost:3001/join/student"; const handleSubmit = (data) => { alert(data); console.log(data); }; return ( <>

); }; export default Signup;
